title: Baked Honey-Mustard Chicken
ingredients: ['oil spray, as needed', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon English mustard', '1 tablespoon spicy mustard', '1 tablespoon coarse mustard', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '335g salted pretzels', '125ml mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons English mustard', '3 tablespoons honey', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
